@graph.name: How to Cook a Ribeye Steak - Damn Delicious
@graph.description: How to Cook a Ribeye Steak - Why go to a steakhouse when you can make the most perfect ribeye right at home? Pan seared with the best garlicky herb butter!

itemListElement.name: How to Cook a Ribeye Steak

@graph.name: Chungah @ Damn Delicious
@graph.description: Chungah is the recipe developer and photographer of Damn Delicious, a blog that was founded in 2011. She thought she would become an epidemiologist, obtaining a sociology degree at UCLA and a Masters in Public Health at USC. But what began as a grad school hobby blog is now her full-time job. Originally from Queens and living most of her life in Los Angeles, she now resides in Chicago with her crazy corgi duo, Butters and Cartman. She loves donuts and binging on Grey's Anatomy reruns, and hopes to one day start her very own corgi rescue.
